title: LEGO Batman 2
notes: It loads until menu, controller works, heavy visual glitches, g ame refuses to make a saved file, when it enters a cutscene sound is playing but screen goes dark with a few white flickering spots
Game starts with a black window, then immediately minimizes.  Clicking on the icon in the list of running applications crashes the game.  Entirely unplayable.
title: LEGO® Batman 2 DC Super Heroes™

notes: Starts but hangs before playable. Cutscenes play. Some artifacts on cars and a logo during menu. Tried disabling Esync and D3D11 as well as using Wine D3D11, none make a difference.
title: LEGO® Batman 2 DC Super Heroes™

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Game doesn even load, i get a white screen and then a black screen and then i am back on my desktop
title: LEGO® Batman 2 DC Super Heroes™

notes:
In order for it to launch in the first place, you have to manually go into the game directory. (steamapps/common/LEGO Batman 2) From there you go to the "Support" folder and manually run "DXSETUP.exe" in your proton wineprefix. (steamapps/compatdata/213330/pfx) My particular command was: "WINEPREFIX=/home/mylogin/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/213330/pfx wine DXSETUP.exe" For some reason when I installed the game it didn't auto-run this installer.

After that the game launched but I experienced extremely choppy audio. This was fixed by adding "PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC=25 %command%" to the launch options.

Quite often the framerate dipped below 60fps but the game was still totally playable. (This was also at max settings) I played the game to 100% and didn't experience any other problems. Controllers worked perfectly.
title: LEGO® Batman 2 DC Super Heroes™

notes: i follow the instructions of my partner and the game works, make more easy in terminal put "WINEPREFIX=/juegos/juegos_compartidos/steamapps/compatdata/213330/pfx wine /juegos/juegos_compartidos/steamapps/common/LEGO\ Batman\ 2/Support/DirectX/DXSETUP.exe " and the sound is regular by put in launcher options "PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC=25 %command%" is playable, but is not silver
title: LEGO® Batman 2 DC Super Heroes™
